class.name: VisionOSVRInterface
class.brief_description: visionOS VR implementation for rendering in immersive mode.
class.description:
This is a visionOS VR implementation for rendering in immersive mode.
You must use the Metal rendering driver, and only the Mobile renderer is supported for now.
You can initialize this interface as follows: [codeblock] var interface = XRServer.find_interface("visionOS") if interface and interface.initialize(): get_viewport().use_xr = true [/codeblock]
